input_args.text: 'US In Danger of Losing Allies In Asia Philippines President turning his country away from the US and pivoting in the direction of China. \nOften called the Donald Trump of the Philippines, this new President is turning away from America as an ally and is embracing China. \nThis threat to national security cannot be overstated. If we lose the Philippines as an ally, China will have free military reign of Asia. South Korea, Taiwan, Australia, New Zealand and Vietnam will be in grave danger. An analysis of this potential threat is contained in the following video.'
